title: Libra and Sagittarius Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: This is a great match for a long-term connection.
steps.content: This is a great match for a long-term connection. Sagittarius is friendly and a natural entertainer. In addition, Astrologer Angel Eyedealism notes, "Sagittarius has zero patience for lying. Even if it's painful, they would rather know the truth from the other person." These are qualities that Libra has as well, so it’s pretty easy for these signs to feed off of each other's energy.

steps.title: Compromise is part of every relationship, including this one.
steps.content: Compromise is part of every relationship, including this one. While Libra and Sagittarius are a great match, Libra’s diplomatic and peace-loving nature can struggle when Sagittarius gets too blunt. Since both signs are capable of being good friends with one another, being honest about this friction can help them resolve any tension. [1] X Research source

steps.title: These signs are a perfect match sexually.
steps.content: These signs are a perfect match sexually. In terms of initial chemistry, according to astrologer Angel Eyedealism, "Libras tend to be very attractive people," which attracts the sexually-adventurous Sagittarius. On the flip-side, Sagittarius’ worldliness provides the sophistication that Libra finds so alluring—as Angel Eyedealism notes, Libra "wants a [partner] that is refined and intellectual," which Sagittarius delivers in spades.

steps.title: Libra and Sagittarius have a great time in the bedroom.
steps.content: Libra and Sagittarius have a great time in the bedroom. Sagittarius’ adventurous streak includes what they like during sex, and Libra is happy to oblige, since they love giving their partners pleasure. Sex between these signs is never boring. [2] X Research source If you’re in one of these relationships, don’t be afraid to talk to your partner about what you like in the bedroom. Sagittarius appreciates this kind of open communication, and Libra is always looking for ways to bring more pleasure into the relationship.

steps.title: These signs have great emotional chemistry for friendships.
steps.content: These signs have great emotional chemistry for friendships. They can click really quickly since they appreciate each other’s quick wit and ability to make clever observations. This kind of chemistry brings with it a solid friendship that both signs can appreciate. [3] X Research source

steps.title: In a relationship, their emotional needs can be out of sync.
steps.content: In a relationship, their emotional needs can be out of sync. Sometimes Libra can end up playing the role of damsel in distress, which can make the independent-minded Sagittarius feel frustrated when they need space. Libra’s sense of aesthetics and sophistication might not match up well with Sagittarius’ grittier outlook. [4] X Research source Since Libras and Sagittariuses genuinely enjoy each other’s company, they can make up for their incompatibilities with quality time spent together. If you’re in one of these relationships and are feeling a little misunderstood, schedule some time together to do an activity—you’ll soon remember why you’re a great pair.

steps.title: Trust can be a hurdle for these signs.
steps.content: Trust can be a hurdle for these signs. Libra is often romantic and starts planning a fairy tale ending with Sagittarius after they first get a hint of mutual attraction. On the other hand, Sagittarius can be infamous for their unwillingness to commit. This can lead to friction—Libra wants a fantasy of love that Sagittarius feels really uncomfortable in. On the other hand, Libras can also tend to flip-flop between wanting to be in a relationship and wanting to be out of one. This kind of indecisiveness can drive Sagittarius crazy, and make them feel like Libra isn’t trustworthy because they aren’t consistent. In order to develop trust in a relationship, Libra and Sagittarius will need to communicate openly and not try to assume the other’s feelings. Luckily, Sagittarius and Libra can both appreciate a straightforward conversation, so try opening a conversation with something like, “Where do you think our relationship is heading?”

steps.title: Knowledge is extremely important to both signs.
steps.content: Knowledge is extremely important to both signs. Ruled by Jupiter, Sagittarius is always seeking wisdom from life, which is a major part of why they’re so interested in adventures. As an air sign, Libras love diving into ideas, philosophy, and art. These signs naturally appreciate the other’s thoughts and are a formidable intellectual duo. Watching unusual movies or listening to niche music can get both Sagittarius and Libra excited—Libra because of their love for art, and Sagittarius for their interest in new experiences.

steps.title: No relationship is perfect, but this one gets close.
steps.content: No relationship is perfect, but this one gets close. Although trust can be an issue between these two signs when Libra’s fantasies don’t give Sagittarius the room they need, communication can overcome this issue. Once there’s trust, Libra and Sagittarius can enjoy their fantastic chemistry in and out of the bedroom and find a partner for their shared journey to discover truth and beauty in the world.
